content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max! Thank you for coming to see my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 Euros per month. The apartment is 25 square meters, and it's in the center of the city. It's a very good location. What do you think about the rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Max. Based on the location and size of the apartment, I believe that a rental price of 1500 Euros per month would be reasonable. This would allow me to maximize my gains while still making the apartment affordable for you. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, it is within my budget. I agree to the price of 1500 Euros per month. Please send me a lease agreement.
```
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max! I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement. I will send you a lease agreement as soon as possible. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
